column4: MechDave: Practice good security keep updated, and good passwords. It is possible to do, but not as easily as the single click of being owned under windows, despite my best efforts to covince windows users to stop running as admin.
Those who have listened and keeped admin/user accounts have gone longer without issue...
Windows is basically crippled with a non privileged account
pretty much lol. For just the facebookers it is alright, keeps them from shooting themselves in the foot.
